titleStmt.title: Gloucesters myte deliuered vvith the mournefull records of Great Britaine, into the worlds register. For the inrolement of the euerlasting fame and perpetuall remembrance of our late and most gratious Prince Henrie. With motiues to repentance. The materiall points touched, appeare in the next page.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Thomas, of Tewkesbury.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by William Hall, for Ionas Man,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
